text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode where concept descends from _MaterialEntityClassType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in SpecimenAdditiveEntity
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ContainerEntityType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in MedicalDevice
  • Import all the codes that are contained in SpecimenEntityType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in VaccineEntityType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in x_BillableProduct

name: MaterialEntityClassType
title: MaterialEntityClassType
